text:
If you attempt to write a forumla using the COUNTIF function, when you open the
generated sheet in Excel 2000 you get a #VALUE!. The generated formula looks
correct and is legal for Excel, but for some reason does not process. If you
double click it will compile, though.

This is exactly the same problem reported for SUMIF in bug number 11827.

Thanks.
creator: robertmacgrogan@yahoo.com
josh@apache.org
text:
Retested OK in 3.1-beta1

This was probably fixed due to bug 44675 (var-args param count issues)

creator: josh@apache.org
text: *** Bug 35177 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
